name: Stealth Exit Strategies
description: Tactical methods for disengaging from toxic individuals and environments without triggering retaliation.

cards.title: The Fade-Out Method
cards.description: Gradually disengaging from toxic people without confrontation or suspicion.
cards.bulletpoints: Reducing Availability, Shifting Social Circles, Controlled Disinterest Projection

cards.title: Silent Disappearance
cards.description: Executing a clean and undetectable social withdrawal.
cards.bulletpoints: Digital and Social Media Detachment, Sudden Interest Shifts, Passive Contact Elimination

cards.title: The Strategic Confrontation
cards.description: When direct confrontation is necessary, using calculated tactics to escape with minimal damage.
cards.bulletpoints: Verbal Boundary Enforcement, Emotional Neutrality Tactics, Non-Reactive Conflict Diffusion
